title: How to Be a Normal Teen (Girls)

steps.title: Know that there is no specific "attitude."
steps.content: Know that there is no specific "attitude." Just go with the flow and be yourself . There is no such thing as normal; normal means to fit in well with society.

steps.title: Wear clothes that express you.
steps.content: Wear clothes that express you. You don't have to look like that model in "Seventeen." Develop your own style as you go along. If you wear unusual clothing with confidence, you can still be "normal."

steps.title: Be mindful of those around you if you choose to swear.
steps.content: Be mindful of those around you if you choose to swear. It is important to respect that others might find vulgar language distasteful, including many adults. (Some teens choose to abstain completely from swearing, and that's fine, too!)

steps.title: Choose your friends wisely.
steps.content: Choose your friends wisely. Yes, you're going to meet people who do mean things. But you don't have to be one of those people. You can be whatever and hang with whoever. If your friends don't treat you the way you deserve, or if they pressure you to do things you're not comfortable with, you can choose new friends!

steps.title: Be active.
steps.content: Be active. Don't just lay around the house. Get out and go to the pool with your friends, go talk to boys, play a sport, do whatever you find fun.

steps.title: Have a healthy social life.
steps.content: Have a healthy social life. Lots of girls these days have Instagram, Snapchat, Twitter, Pinterest, etc. You do not have to have these to have a social life. Socialize face-to-face with people.

steps.title: Refrain from obsessing about money, or talking about how much your parents make.
steps.content: Refrain from obsessing about money, or talking about how much your parents make. You can be cool and normal no matter what your family's economic status.

steps.title: Keep your hygiene up.
steps.content: Keep your hygiene up. Take a shower or bathe every day and use antiperspirant. Brush your hair and teeth, floss, use mouthwash, daily stuff.

steps.title: Make the grade.
steps.content: Make the grade. Try your best in school. Getting straight A's is excellent; it's not nerdy at all. Make high goals for your academic life, and try your best to achieve them.

steps.title: Have a life.
steps.content: Have a life. "Normal" girls have best friends and hang out with guys. They occasionally get into trouble with things such as ding-dong-ditch, but nothing too life changing .

steps.title: Remember that normal doesn't exist.
steps.content: Remember that normal doesn't exist. Be yourself; no one likes a poser.

steps.title: Find a friend who you can tell everything to, someone you can trust 100%.
steps.content: Find a friend who you can tell everything to, someone you can trust 100%. Don't bottle everything up!
